players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Good morning everyone. It’s tragic about Diana. We need to work together carefully to find the mafia among us."
You: "It's sad about Diana. We should all share our thoughts and try to figure out who might be the mafia among us."
Charlie: "Bob, you’ve been very quiet so far. Do you have any thoughts on who might be suspicious?"
You: "I agree with Charlie; Bob, please share your thoughts. We need everyone's input to catch the mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
